sentence: Doug Ducey has also resisted appeals by Senate Republicans for him to jump into the Senate race to try to take on Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly.
title: Hogan won’t challenge Van Hollen for Maryland Senate seat

sentence: Doug Ducey to mount a challenge against Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly.
author: Josh Israel
title: Another GOP Governor Rejects McConnell Plea To Run For US Senate

sentence: We have a strong field of candidates in Arizona and I will be actively supporting our nominee – and perhaps weighing in before the primary.” The news was a major blow to efforts that state Republicans and national GOP leaders are undertaking to unseat Mark Kelly, the first-term senator from the state who won a special election to fill the seat of Sen John McCain, a Republican who died in 2018, for the remainder of Mr McCain’s term ending this year.
author: John Bowden
title: Ducey, Hogan, Sununu: Why GOP governors who spurned Trump are refusing to run for Senate

sentence: Former President Donald Trump celebrated on Thursday after Senate GOP Leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY) failed at recruiting a top contender to challenge Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ) in the 2022 midterm elections.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Trump brags about destroying Mitch McConnell’s plan to recruit a coveted Senate candidate

sentence: “Once again, Senate Republicans’ recruitment efforts have failed, and their top potential candidates are refusing to run against strong Democratic Senators like Mark Kelly,” Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee spokesman Patrick Burgwinkle said in a statement.
author: Melanie MasonStaff Writer
title: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey opts out of Senate run — a setback for GOP hopes

sentence: While I’m disappointed he decided not to run, Arizona will be an important part of our plan to win the majority back.” Chris Hartline, a spokesperson for the NRSC, said Republicans “have great candidates running in Arizona, one of whom will beat Mark Kelly in November.” Ducey’s decision to bypass the race removes a potential obstacle for the other Republican candidates, including state Attorney General Mark Brnovich; Blake Masters, a venture capitalist; and Jim Lamon, an energy executive self-funding his campaign.
title: Ducey won't run for Senate in Arizona

sentence: For months, he had told both reporters pressing him and Republicans courting him that he had little appetite to challenge Senator Mark Kelly, a first-term Democrat.
title: Ducey Confirms He Will Not Run for Senate, Despite McConnell’s Wooing

sentence: Doug Ducey confirmed he will not challenge vulnerable Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly in November.
author: Susan Ferrechio
title: Senate recruiting becomes proxy war in Trump-McConnell feud

sentence: Doug Ducey (R) announced in a letter to donors that he wouldn’t launch a bid against incumbent Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ).
author: John Judis
title: Where Things Stand: McConnell Warns ‘Unacceptable’ GOP Candidates Could Spoil The Fun For Everyone
